mapper.select: SELECT rownum as bucketNo , bucket_id , k.book_id , b.book_nm , b.book_cover , b.book_cover_path , b.book_publ_co , b.book_writer , b.book_Intro , k.member_id , bucket_st_cd , ( select scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'BS' and scode = k.bucket_st_cd ) as bucket_st_nm , bucket_ord , bucket_done_dt , bucket_del_yn , k.ins_dt , k.udt_dt FROM BUCKET_BOOK K , book B WHERE K.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND K.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY rownum

SELECT bucket_id , k.book_id , b.book_nm , b.book_cover , b.book_cover_path , b.book_publ_co , b.book_writer , b.book_Intro , k.member_id , bucket_st_cd , ( select scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'BS' and scode = k.bucket_st_cd ) as bucket_st_nm , bucket_ord , bucket_done_dt , bucket_del_yn , k.ins_dt , k.udt_dt FROM BUCKET_BOOK k , BOOK B WHERE K.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND k.member_id = #{memberId} AND k.book_id = #{bookId}
